resources.string: Using sensors to record wave data.

This application uses androids built in motion Sensors such as acceloration and gyroscope to retrieve raw data. The raw data is then filtered to reduce noise on gravity components. The filter data is then processed to calculate wave height, wave period, and wave direction.
Using location to get waves data.

Entering in a zip code will allow the application to retrieve the zip codes longitude and latitude coordinates. Those coordinates are then used to get wave data from Marine API. The data hourly wave infromation from one day. Wave height, wave period, and wave direction is returned.
Please enter a valid 5 digit zip code
